NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 38? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from NIT to Parker University or from NIT to Adriantown College?
NC.A: The flow from {NIT} to {Parker University} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from NIT to Adriantown College, from NIT to Parker University, or from Adriantown College to Parker University?

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
